A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The effects are good\, and the music is good.   Unfortunately that is about it.  This is another SJW movie that apparently hates straight white men.  Guys\, diversity is fine\, but just don't cram it down everyones throat.    The good news is that this movie killed my desire to see the next one.  That is saying a lot\, given that even Jar Jar couldn't do that.
